alert.note: Alert for Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 3:19AM CDT until June 15 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Chicot County in southeastern Arkansas... Southern Washington County in northwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Humphreys County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Sharkey County in west central Mississippi... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 318 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chicot Junction, or 8 miles south of Lake Village, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Avon and Wayside around 335 AM CDT. Estill around 345 AM CDT. Hollandale and Panther Burn around 350 AM CDT. Delta City and Darlove around 355 AM CDT. Murphy around 400 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
